means: 正方形的，直爽的，坚定的

sentence.Network_en: He stood foursquare for religious liberty and toleration.

list.abs: A foursquare refusal to yield ., 坚定不移地拒绝屈服.
You know i ' m a foursquare person , just tell me ., 你知道我是一个直爽的人 , 你说吧.
He stood foursquare for religious liberty and toleration ., 他坚定地支持宗教自由和信仰自由.

entry.def: To stand four-square behind someone or something means to be firm in your support of that person or thing.

example.ex: They stood four-square behind their chief, and they would not accept pressure on him to resign...
example.tran: 他们坚决支持自己的领导，而且不允许任何压力迫使其辞职。

example.ex: He was still certain that Franklin was four-square for reform.
example.tran: 他还是很确信富兰克林会坚定不移地支持改革。

entry.tran: (建筑或结构)方方正正的，方正牢固的
entry.def: A four-square building or structure is square in shape and looks solid and well-built.

means.word_mean: 1. (geometry) a plane rectangle with four equal sides and four right angles; a four-sided regular polygon;

sentences.sentence: "you can compute the area of a square if you know the length of its sides"

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by firm and unwavering conviction;
2. with firmness and conviction; without compromise;

sentences.sentence: "he stood foursquare for religious liberty and toleration"- C.G.Bowers
